title: Riot Please Help Me its been 6 days since my post
body: My last post was 6 days ago about my problem with downloading my replays, i usually see other post have at least 1 comment after 2 days but mine has no comments in 6 days. I now think riot is trying to avoid helping me with my problem. I would appreciate a comment saying they are working on fixing it but its been 6 days with no comments so yea. Help me if you wish riot

replies.body:
No-ones avoiding your problem, it just means no-one here knows how to fix it. Try submitting a ticket to player support.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
